page.title: 17Attitude survey results 1
page.content: In response to the 1st question about the best features of living in this part of Cornwall 50% said it was the quality of the landscape and countryside.45% said it was the peace and quiet that the countryside offered that was most important. The 2nd question revealed that the very qualities of life chosen in the 1st were the causes of the least favourable aspects of living here.50% said that isolation from people and services were a problem.The other responses were varied and included, having to work away from home during the week,too many holidaymakers,lack of acceptance of new residents and finally the creation of new housing developments that do not tone into the existing landscape in terms of materials used.
